name: Menaba Charitable Trust
briefDescription: We endevour to rehabilitate PHYSICALLY CHALLENEGD GIRLS FREE OF COST by : Providing education upto std X at schools run by us and by sending them to near by town for std. XI;XII and college Providing medical intervention or Aids Building self confidence to be self Supporting,be a part of MAIN stream and NOT be a parasite to the society or FamilyWe are on way to establish a rehabilitation centre for DISTRESSED WOMEN such as Divrces,Deserted, Old and victms of Rape by providing basic education, and an income generting activity we admit on an average 325 girls per year and so far have rehabilitated1575 girls.

address: Mahavir Jain Soc. Nr. Amber Cinema, Bapunagar, Ahmedabad-380024
